reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nMech Marines It's all about you love from the real time strategy games putted all in together for a great combo of epicness,the community is awesome they learn you the basics,also the devs are constantly helping the players and doing the best as they can do for improving the game.The game haves unique buildings with a lot of details and from a team that puts lots and lots of EFFORT,rare you see other greenlighted game haves effort in it.Mech Marines is constantly growing game that takes lots of awesome updates that keep the game fresh. You think of tactics and tell your friends or use it versus them,you have a variety of choices to destroy the opposite base,either Mech style or bunch of missiles flying over their island.All you love about C&C Red Alert and other real time's is in here. Devs keep in touch community about any bugs and for ideas,they love ideas,and your idea can be in the game! Singleplayer is coming soon so were gonna have lot's of awesome features till then! You will NOT regret buying this game!

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nLooking forward to this. Metal Marines was one of my favorite games back in the day. I would play it daily. I've still been playing it on emulators even to this day. It's nice to see this re made. I hope its just as good. expect to see me playing this quite often as soon as the single plaer mode is playable.

reviewText:
Early Access Review

This is a fun game, simple and quick to learn and play. Build your base then destroy the enemy. Devs are doing their job with frequent updates so you can expect  that it gets even better.
Since it is a Early Access game, there is not much people in lobby, so take the time to train solo and/or find people in the community for multiplayer.
